title: Ideation and Prototyping Session
description: First Edition of the Lecture Series was conducted on Ideation and Prototyping with the founder of Exobot Dynamics Mr. Munish Kumar

title: Zero to Hero: Lecture 2
description: The talk covered Fundraising Fundamentals of an early-age startup by Mr. Seemant Srivastav, who is the co-founder of Mool Innovation of Labs

title: Zero to Hero: Lecture 1
description: Mr. Taranpreet Singh, NSIT alumni and the current CEO of Sharrk Ventures and Sleeplabs, covered the basics of startups and a plethora of details on how to get started in the entrepreneurial journey

title: Incubation at FITT
description: A session on the details about incubating startups at FITT, IIT Delhi, was organized with Mr. Ashutosh Pastor, the Manager for handling Startup Incubation at FITT

title: First Steps Towards Successful Startup
description: The event showcased Mr. Chitransh Sahai, a 2015 IITD alumnus and the current Director and Founder of GoComet - a logistics resource management SaaS platform based out of Singapore

title: Becoming a UG Founder
description: The event featured Mayank Dubey, a CS 4th year undergraduate defying the trend, who knocked on the OCS' doors, looking for employees for his company thepluto.club (StringVenture LLC).

title: Idea-Talk on Electric Vehicles
description: The discussion was majorly on the current status of the EV Market in India and the role of startups

title: Idea-Talk on UPI Payments
description: The discussion was held about the increasing trend around UPI payments in India and the probable domination of the US tech giants in this space

title: Edtech Discussion
description: Provided a platform for exchanging thoughts and ideas on Edtech Startups. It was primarily steered toward discussing the gaps in the existing startups and the future of the Edtech Industry
